Queen of Hearts:

Have you ever tried beer?

For You I have prepared a special recipe.

It is definitely useful to You. Here, note: the Recipe - Elven ale. Now You know what ingredients are needed to prepare this drink.

To prepare it, you need the following: Malt (10 units), Hops (10 units), Yeast (5 units).

To brew this beer easily. Very rarely anyone it does not work. I wish You good luck!

Oh, wait! At the pantry, where the Malt, Hops and Yeast, were attacked by monsters.

I know, braver than You are, and You will be able to beat the ingredients.
